body:
Hey guys, I put one out about a month ago and got great feedback. So I decided to make another one :D

http://imgur.com/I6okWTR,Tc6BXZs,qL6coai,98piDhG

Decided to put Unix AND Campi Erbosi. First images are Campi Erbosi and the rest are Unix.

http://imgur.com/QHlVXfo,pbPLWvL,ITtlhmo,ZKht4Nc,GozyxZ8,o2UQzhA,iJW3Pqp

title: {Senex 3} How To Defend

replies.body: No. Please don't teach people how to defend xD
replies.body_tagged: No. Please don't teach people how to defend xD

replies.body: Why? Are you a rusher? XD
replies.body_tagged: Why? Are you a rusher? XD

replies.body:
The first one isn't that good imo.
You should add buttons/levers (to the crafting tables) and make the entire ring out of crafting tables to avoid block placing.
replies.body_tagged:
The first one isn't that good imo.
You should add buttons/levers (to the crafting tables) and make the entire ring out of crafting tables to avoid block placing.

replies.body:
I like defending but it's so much work and my teammates ruin everything anyways >_<

Good guide though, I'll keep it in mind :)
replies.body_tagged:
I like defending but it's so much work and my teammates ruin everything anyways >_<

Good guide though, I'll keep it in mind :)

replies.body:
@Spicy, I was gonna do that, but the game ended to fast :P I wasn't finished with EITHER defence.

@Cinnamon Thanks :D And on Campi Erbosi, I dont remember who it was but a mod came in and told the people to stop griefing the defence.
replies.body_tagged:
@Spicy, I was gonna do that, but the game ended to fast :P I wasn't finished with EITHER defence.

@Cinnamon Thanks :D And on Campi Erbosi, I dont remember who it was but a mod came in and told the people to stop griefing the defence.

replies.body: Nice job! best defender so far on avicus :P It looks like a tourney defense
replies.body_tagged: Nice job! best defender so far on avicus :P It looks like a tourney defense

replies.body: You are brilliant, you must be the first one here, after me who doesn't cover the monument. You should never cover it, you need a clear view of your monument and placing wood all over the place will never help, that's what many many players think.
replies.body_tagged: You are brilliant, you must be the first one here, after me who doesn't cover the monument. You should never cover it, you need a clear view of your monument and placing wood all over the place will never help, that's what many many players think.

replies.body: :D thanks. And I'm avicus you have those people who block up the monuments while you are setting up a defence and those who help you.
replies.body_tagged: :D thanks. And I'm avicus you have those people who block up the monuments while you are setting up a defence and those who help you.

replies.body:
When I go for the monuments, it makes my day if it's all covered in wood.

The glory of an axe xD

replies.body:
You're welcome c: This is how I do it, I never cover the monument, I never use water, ladders or any other object like that. It has to be transparent. xD

http://i.imgur.com/Db5yOlP.png
